original_title: The Real Ayrton Senna: A Personal Memoir
overview: A unique insight into a charismatic and elusive man: ruthless in a race car, surprisingly open and warm-hearted with friends and family in Brazil. An intensely spiritual man is revealed by his intimate reflections.
tagline: Unique access to Ayrton Senna, the world's greatest race car driver
title: The Real Ayrton Senna: A Personal Memoir
